description: In an area that is sparse in waterfalls, I made my way to a couple of unknowns on Pete's Brook.   I wasn't exactly sure if there would be any on this brook but there was enough drop in topography to warrant an exploration.  From the road, I entered the woods parallel to a pasture.  I intersected a woods road and pushed my way to the stream.  I doesn't look like much at the top.  But by following it downstream, I was rewarded by a few falls ranging from 4-15ft.
directions: Highway 201.  turn on Cris Rd and park near the field at N44° 51' 43.7" W65° 07' 02.7".  Go NE from this point until you hit the stream and go downstream.
title: Pete's Brook Fall
